price: زاتێک کە لە درەختی سەوز ئاگری بۆ دروستکردون ئیتر ئێوە ئاگری پێ دەکەنەوە
arabic: ٱلَّذِي جَعَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ ٱلۡأَخۡضَرِ نَارٗا فَإِذَآ أَنتُم مِّنۡهُ تُوقِدُونَ

version.title: Kurdish Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kurdish by Muhammad Saleh Bamuky. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alladhī jaʿala lakum mina al-shajari al-akhḍari nāran fa-idhā antum min'hu tūqidūna
